mapper.select: SELECT ATTAC_FILE_NUM, FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, REAL_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM ATTAC_FILE WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}

SELECT ROWNUM RN, B.BOARD_NUM, B.TITLE, B.WRITER_NM, B.WRITE_DATE, B.HIGH_BOARD_NUM, B.WRITE_DATE, B.REVIEW_CNT, U.MEMB_ID FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN USR U ON B.MEMB_NUM = U.MEMB_NUM WHERE B.HIGH_BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM BOARD WHERE QUES_CD = '2101'

SELECT RN, BOARD_NUM, HIGH_BOARD_NUM, TITLE, CONT, REVIEW_CNT, WRITE_DATE, QUES_CD, CATE_NM, MEMB_ID, TOT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, BOARD_NUM, HIGH_BOARD_NUM, TITLE, CONT, REVIEW_CNT, WRITE_DATE, B.QUES_CD, C.CATE_NM, U.MEMB_ID, 0 AS TOT FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN USR U ON B.MEMB_NUM = U.MEMB_NUM INNER JOIN CD C ON B.QUES_CD = C.CD
) BOARD WHERE RN >= #{START} AND #{END} >= RN

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM BOARD WHERE QUES_CD = '2101'
AND WRITER_NM like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND TITLE like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

SELECT RN, BOARD_NUM, HIGH_BOARD_NUM, TITLE, CONT, REVIEW_CNT, WRITE_DATE, QUES_CD, CATE_NM, MEMB_ID, TOT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, BOARD_NUM, HIGH_BOARD_NUM, TITLE, CONT, REVIEW_CNT, WRITE_DATE, B.QUES_CD, C.CATE_NM, U.MEMB_ID, 0 AS TOT FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN USR U ON B.MEMB_NUM = U.MEMB_NUM INNER JOIN CD C ON B.QUES_CD = C.CD WHERE 1 = 1
AND B.WRITER_NM like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND B.TITLE like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
) BOARD WHERE RN >= #{START} AND #{END} >= RN

SELECT B.BOARD_NUM, B.TITLE, B.WRITER_NM, B.WRITE_DATE, B.HIGH_BOARD_NUM, B.REVIEW_CNT, B.QUES_CD, c.CATE_NM, p.MEMB_ID FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN USR p ON B.MEMB_NUM = p.MEMB_NUM INNER JOIN CD C ON B.QUES_CD = C.CD where c.BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET REVIEW_CNT = REVIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
